DOC.brief_summary: 60 ASA physical status I II patient , age 18-75 year old , schedule elective video-assisted thoracoscopic lobectomy surgery , randomize 2 group , 30 patient group : 1. control group 2. treatment group . Patients treatment group receive transcutaneous electrical acupoint stimulation ( TEAS ) surgery 6h 24h surgery . Patients control group receive TIVA general anesthesia sham electrical stimulation . Serum patient group collect surgery , 1h 25h surgery , respectively . Serum level TNF-alpha , IL-1 beta , CXCL8 , IFN gamma IL-4 different time point measure compare two group .
DOC.detailed_description: 60 ASA physical status I II patient , age 18-75 year old , schedule elective video-assisted thoracoscopic lobectomy surgery , randomize 2 group , 30 patient group : 1. control group , receive total intravenous anesthesia ( TIVA ) sham stimulation ; 2. treatment group , receive ( TIVA ) transcutaneous electrical acupoint stimulation ( TEAS ) . Since 30 min induction anesthesia , patient treatment group stimulate 4 acupoints , Houxi、Zhigou、Neiguan Hegu side Han 's Acupoint Nerve Stimulator ( HANS ) end operation . At 6h 24h surgery , patient treatment group receive TEAS , 30 min time.The frequency 2/100Hz , stimulate intensity maximum current could tolerate patient awake.The control group receive TIVA general anesthesia sham electrical stimulation.Serum patient group collect surgery , 1h 25h surgery , respectively serum level TNF-alpha , IL-1 beta , CXCL8 , IFN gamma IL-4 different time point measure . The primary outcome measure serum TNF-alpha IL-1 beta level 25h surgery . The secondary outcome measure include serum level TNF-alpha , IL-1 beta , CXCL8 , Th1/Th2 ratio ( calculate IFN gamma/IL-4 ) 1h post surgery serum level CXCL8 , Th1/Th2 ratio 25h post surgery .
DOC.criteria: Patients diagnose NonSmall Cell Lung Carcinoma ( NSCLC ) elective videoassisted thoracoscopic lobectomy surgery ASA grade 12 BMI 18 31 kg/m2 history thoracic surgery Unwilling receive transcutaneous electrical acupoint stimulation BMI ≥ 32 kg/m2 Infection scar acupoints periphery nerve injury upper low limb Severe liver , renal , brain lung disease Drug abuse Patients coordinate investigator , dysphasia，severe infectious disease disturbance consciousness Patients participate trial
